entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Static Web Assets] DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints throws ArgumentException due to duplicate key #43033
  • `dotnet format style` fails when requiring .NET Framework Build Host exe #43017
  • Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset download check fails because NuGetPackageRoot is unset in some scenarios #43016

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET9 p7 zip installed, the prompt message "update are available for the..." should be displayed after running "dotnet workload install maui --skip-manifest-update". #42526
    Discussion
  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 RC1, creating 8.0/6.0 project requires September Servicing (8.0.9/6.0.34) feeds. #42888

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Setup private feeds for tests #43041
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Warn when enabling Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #43039
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Static web assets] Reduce allocations on DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints #43038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Explicity set UseConsolidatedMvcViews to false. #43037
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #42807
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Support --no-restore option in dotnet test #43034
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • Define "ToolingPackageVersion" properties for msbuild tooling dependencies #43008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Send supported protocol version to the testing platform #43003
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Alpha Branding #42743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Put binlog directly into the VMR's #42984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] Update SBRP dependency #43012
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable workload search for users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Temporary fix for the cppcli tests #42811
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Permit workload restore to work with new global.json #42606
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert disabling the toolset package in Helix #42860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
